<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4584</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">What are Action Projects?</string>
            <string language="es">¿Qué son proyectos de acción?</string>
            <string language="ga">Cad iad Tionscadail Ghníomhaíochta?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was sind Tätigkeit Projekte?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quels sont des projets d'action ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que são projetos da ação?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa sono i progetti di azione?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι είναι προγράμματα ενέργειας;</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Overview of what constitutes an appropriate Action Project for JC. Projects should have a genuine action component and not be purely research based (e.g., scrapbook notion).</string>
            <string language="es">Visión general de lo que constituye un proyecto de acción apropiado para el certificado Júnior (JC, Junior Certificate). Los proyectos deberían tener un componente de acción genuino y no estar basados únicamente en la investigación (p. ej. un álbum de rec</string>
            <string language="ga">Forbhreathnú ar chéard é Tionscadal Gníomhaíochta cuí don Teastas Sóisearach. Ba cheart fíor-chomhpháirt gníomhaíochta a bheith sna tionscadail agus gan iad a bheith bunaithe ar fad ar thaighde (e.g. coincheap an leabhair gearrthóg).</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">CSPE</string>
            <string language="es">CSPE</string>
            <string language="ga">OSSP</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Additional Resource</string>
            <string language="es">Recurso adicional</string>
            <string language="ga">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Überblick über, was ein geeignete Schritt-Projekt für 
JC festsetzt. Projekte sollten einen echten Tätigkeit 
Bestandteil haben und die gegründete Forschung nicht lediglich sein 
(z.B., Scrapbookbegriff).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vue d'ensemble de ce qui constitue un projet d'action 
appropriée pour JC. Les projets devraient avoir un composant 
véritable d'action et ne pas être purement recherche basée (par 
exemple, notion d'album).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vista geral de o que constitui um projeto da ação 
apropriada para JC. Os projetos devem ter um componente genuíno
da ação e não ser puramente pesquisa baseada (por exemplo, noção 
do scrapbook).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrizione di che cosa costituisce un progetto di azione 
appropriata per JC. I progetti dovrebbero avere un componente 
genuino di azione e non essere puramente ricerca basata (per esempio, 
nozione dell'album).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επισκόπηση αυτό που αποτελεί ένα κατάλληλο πρόγραμμα
ενέργειας για JC. Τα προγράμματα πρέπει να έχουν ένα 
γνήσιο τμήμα ενέργειας και να μην είναι καθαρά έρευνα που 
βασίζεται (π.χ., έννοια λευκώματος αποκομμάτων).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">CSPE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusätzliches Hilfsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">CSPE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource Supplémentaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">CSPE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso Adicional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">CSPE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa Supplementare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">CSPE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόσθετο στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
